T06TD4084E:217b-1: dharma bi ni shtsa ya n'a ma pra ka ra na /
T06TD4084E:217b-3: chos rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa ;
T06TD4084E:217b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4084E:217b-5: 'phags pa klu sgrub la sogs pas //
T06TD4084E:217b-6: sangs rgyas bstan la goms byas nas //
T06TD4084E:217b-7: chos dang chos min log rtog pa'i //
T06TD4084E:217b-9: gang gis dang po 'khor ba'i dpal //
T06TD4084E:217b-10: phyi nas thar pa thob byed pa //
T06TD4084E:217b-11: de ni dam pa'i chos yin te //
T06TD4084E:217b-12: mdor bsdus dad pa shes rab kyis //
T06TD4084E:217b-14: dad pas chos rnams kun du tshol //
T06TD4084E:217b-15: shes rab kyis ni de nyid rig / shes rab gtso bor gyur pa ste //
T06TD4084E:217b-16: dad pa sngon du 'gro ba yin //
T06TD4084E:218a-2: gang zhig chos las mi 'da' ba //
T06TD4084E:218a-3: de ni dang par shes bya ste //
T06TD4084E:218a-4: mchog gi go 'phang nyid yin no //
T06TD4084E:218a-5: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las //
T06TD4084E:218a-6: thams cad yang dag brtag bya ste //
T06TD4084E:218a-7: bdag dang gzhan la phan gyur pa //
T06TD4084E:218a-8: shes nas brtag byed mkhas pa yis //
T06TD4084E:218a-9: srog gcod ma byin len spong dang //
T06TD4084E:218a-10: gzhan gyi bud med rnam par spong //
T06TD4084E:218a-11: brdzun dang dbyen dang tshig rtsub dang //
T06TD4084E:218a-12: ngag kyal ba ni rnam par spong //
T06TD4084E:218a-13: brnab sems gnod sems log lta spong //
T06TD4084E:218a-14: 'di rnams dge ba'i las lam bcu //
T06TD4084E:218a-15: bzlog pa nag po'i phyogs nyid do//
T06TD4084E:218a-17: rnam par mi 'tshe gus sbyin dang //
T06TD4084E:218a-18: mchod par 'os la mchod par byed //
T06TD4084E:218a-19: sems can kun la byams sems te //
T06TD4084E:218a-20: mdor bsdus 'di rnams chos yin no //
T06TD4084E:218a-21: lus gdung nyi tshe byed ba la //
T06TD4084E:218a-22: dam chos yod pa ma yin te //
T06TD4084E:218a-23: gang phyir gzhan 'khu las ma log //
T06TD4084E:218a-24: gzhan la phan 'dogs med phyir ro //
T06TD4084E:218a-25: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brgyan pa'i //
T06TD4084E:218a-26: chos kyi lam ni chen po ste //
T06TD4084E:218a-27: gang gis bor te gzhan du 'gro //
T06TD4084E:218a-28: lam ngan phugs ma'i lam 'gro ba //
T06TD4084E:218a-31: dpag med skye bo'i shing gis gang //
T06TD4084E:218a-32: nyon mongs sprul gyis lus la 'khril //
T06TD4084E:218a-34: srog gcod pas ni tshe thung 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:218a-35: rnam par 'tshe bas nad mang ba'o //
T06TD4084E:218a-36: ma byin len pas longs spyod med //
T06TD4084E:218a-37: 'dod log spyod pas dgra dang bcas //
T06TD4084E:218a-38: brdzun du smra bas tshig mi btsun //
T06TD4084E:218a-40: tshig rtsub kyis ni mi snyan thos //
T06TD4084E:218a-43: gnod sems kyis ni 'jigs pa ster//
T06TD4084E:218a-44: log par lta bas lta ngan 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:218a-45: chang gi btung bas blo gros 'khrul //
T06TD4084E:218a-46: ser sna phongs par 'gyur ba yin //
T06TD4084E:218a-48: nga rgyal gyis ni rigs dman 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:218a-49: phrag dog gis ni phun tshogs srab //
T06TD4084E:218a-50: khro bas kha dog ngan par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:218b-0: @218b mkhas la ma dris rmongs par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:218b-3: mi dge 'di rnams bshad pa ni //
T06TD4084E:218b-4: rnam par smin par rab tu grags //
T06TD4084E:218b-5: de yis mi mthun phyogs kun gyi //
T06TD4084E:218b-7: chags dang zhe sdang gti mug dang //
T06TD4084E:218b-8: de las skyes pa'i las mi dge //
T06TD4084E:218b-9: chags med zhe sdang gti mug med //
T06TD4084E:218b-10: de las skyes pa'i las kyang dge //
T06TD4084E:218b-11: mi dge ba las sdug bsngal kun //
T06TD4084E:218b-12: de bzhin ngan 'gro thams cad kyang //
T06TD4084E:218b-13: dge bas bde ba thams cad dang //
T06TD4084E:218b-14: de bzhin bde 'gro thams cad do //
T06TD4084E:218b-16: zhe sdang gis ni dmyal bar 'gro //
T06TD4084E:218b-17: gti mug gis ni dud 'gror skye //
T06TD4084E:218b-18: mi dang lha las go bzlog pa'o //
T06TD4084E:218b-19: sdig pa kun las bzlog par bya //
T06TD4084E:218b-20: rtag tu dge ba kun la 'jug / lus dang ngag dang yid dag gi //
T06TD4084E:218b-21: chos ni rnam pa gsum du brjod //
T06TD4084E:218b-22: dmyal ba yi dvags dud 'gro las //
T06TD4084E:218b-23: chos 'di yis ni rnam par grol //
T06TD4084E:218b-24: mi dang lha dag thob 'gyur zhing //
T06TD4084E:218b-25: dge ba rgyal srid rgyas pa'ang thob //
T06TD4084E:218b-26: bsam gtan gzugs med tshad med kyis //
T06TD4084E:218b-27: tshangs pa la sogs bde ba thob //
T06TD4084E:218b-28: 'di rnams mtho ris chos dag gi //
T06TD4084E:218b-29: 'bras bu dag kyang mdor bsdus pa'o /
T06TD4084E:218b-31: // / gzhan yang nges par legs pa'i chos //
T06TD4084E:218b-32: dngos po'i de nyid rnam par nges //
T06TD4084E:218b-33: de ni sems can bsam dbye bas //
T06TD4084E:218b-34: rnam pa bzhi ru yongs su grags //
T06TD4084E:218b-35: bye brag tu smra ba yi //
T06TD4084E:218b-36: sna tshogs dang ni de kho nyid //
T06TD4084E:218b-37: phung po lnga yi bdag nyid 'dod //
T06TD4084E:218b-38: de dag zad par grol bar bshad //
T06TD4084E:218b-39: yang na gang zag gcig pu ngas //
T06TD4084E:218b-40: mdo sde pa yi lta ba'i gzhung //
T06TD4084E:218b-41: dbang po lnga dang shes pa dgu //
T06TD4084E:218b-42: gzugs dang sgra sogs rnam pa lnga //
T06TD4084E:218b-43: me long nang gi gdong pa bzhin //
T06TD4084E:218b-44: glog gi gzugs brnyan bems por mthong //
T06TD4084E:218b-45: skad cig mar gnas sna tshogs 'dod //
T06TD4084E:218b-46: de bzhin de kho na nyid ni //
T06TD4084E:218b-48: zag med thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T06TD4084E:218b-49: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i gzhung lugs ni //
T06TD4084E:218b-50: thams cad rmi lam lta bu ste //
T06TD4084E:218b-51: gang gang snang ba de de'i rnams //
T06TD4084E:219a-2: gzung dang 'dzin med sems kyi rgyun //
T06TD4084E:219a-3: rnam shes tsam gyi bdag nyid ni //
T06TD4084E:219a-4: sna tshogs zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T06TD4084E:219a-5: snying rjes tshogs gnyis la goms byas //
T06TD4084E:219a-6: rnam par grol ba 'di lta bu //
T06TD4084E:219a-7: longs spyod rdzogs dang bde ba che //
T06TD4084E:219a-8: yon tan dam pa mtha' yas sprul //
T06TD4084E:219a-9: gzung dang 'dzin las rnam par grol //
T06TD4084E:219a-10: ji srid dpal gyi mthar thug thob //
T06TD4084E:219a-11: srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol //
T06TD4084E:219a-13: 'khor ba'i sems can sdug bsngal las //
T06TD4084E:219a-14: yongs su skyob pa'i brtul zhugs che ;
T06TD4084E:219a-16: sna tshogs gnyis su med par rig / sgro btags kun las rnam par grol //
T06TD4084E:219a-17: dbu ma'i gzhung ni rab rtogs pas //
T06TD4084E:219a-18: kun rdzob rgyu la rab brten nas //
T06TD4084E:219a-19: ji ltar gsungs pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub //
T06TD4084E:219a-20: gnyis med bsgrub bya skyon med pas //
T06TD4084E:219a-21: gtan tshigs med par dgag mi nus //
T06TD4084E:219a-22: 'gro kun rang bzhin med pa ste //
T06TD4084E:219a-23: de phyir dngos po med pa yin //
T06TD4084E:219a-24: gang du dngos po med gyur pa //
T06TD4084E:219a-25: de ru med par ji ltar 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:219a-26: de phyir kun rdzob nyid du 'di //
T06TD4084E:219a-27: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga //
T06TD4084E:219a-28: dngos po med cing dngos med min //
T06TD4084E:219a-29: sangs rgyas nyid ni rnam gsum 'dod //
T06TD4084E:219a-30: la la phung po lnga bdag nyid //
T06TD4084E:219a-31: gzugs tsam nyid kyi bdag nyid gzhan //
T06TD4084E:219a-32: ma skyes pa yi bdag nyid ni //
T06TD4084E:219a-33: dbu ma gzhan dag smra ba yin //
T06TD4084E:219a-34: phung po lnga ni med pa nyid //
T06TD4084E:219a-35: gsal ba rnams med nyid kyang min //
T06TD4084E:219a-36: brdzun pa'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor dang //
T06TD4084E:219a-37: bde ba gcig pu'i rnam pa'ang spangs //
T06TD4084E:219a-38: kun rdzob tsam du'ang med pa ste //
T06TD4084E:219a-39: phyogs dus bdag dang dbang phyug bzhin //
T06TD4084E:219a-40: de phyir rnam bcas rnam shes kyi //
T06TD4084E:219a-41: bdag nyid tsam gyi 'gro gsum ste //
T06TD4084E:219a-42: snang yang rigs pas gnod pa'i phyir //
T06TD4084E:219a-43: brdzun pa tsam ste kun rdzob bo //
T06TD4084E:219a-44: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba //
T06TD4084E:219a-45: gzhan gyi lugs kyi dbu ma'o //
T06TD4084E:219a-46: phyogs 'di gnyis ka mi rung ste //
T06TD4084E:219a-47: gang du sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i //
T06TD4084E:219a-48: 'gro ba rnams ni rlag byed pa //
T06TD4084E:219a-49: dbu ma'i tshig can chad ltar brjod //
T06TD4084E:219a-50: dngos po bkag pas dngos med de //
T06TD4084E:219b-0: sna @219b tshogs dngos po mi 'dod pa //
T06TD4084E:219b-1: de phyir khyod kyi dbu ma ni //
T06TD4084E:219b-2: dngos po med pa ci ste min //
T06TD4084E:219b-3: dgag bya'i yul dag med pa nas //
T06TD4084E:219b-5: de nyid rang gi tshig gis gsal //
T06TD4084E:219b-6: gzhan la'ang ji ltar go bar bya //
T06TD4084E:219b-7: ma brtags na ni sna tshogs mthong //
T06TD4084E:219b-8: brtags na mthong ba med zer na //
T06TD4084E:219b-9: dngos dang dngos med de bzhin min //
T06TD4084E:219b-10: de phyir de dag gnyis spangs pa //
T06TD4084E:219b-11: stong phrag du mar spyad kyang ni //
T06TD4084E:219b-12: gsal ba tsam ni bsal mi nus //
T06TD4084E:219b-13: gal te dpyad pas nus med na //
T06TD4084E:219b-14: nye bar dgod par mi rigs so //
T06TD4084E:219b-15: nus byas gsal ba tsam nyid dang //
T06TD4084E:219b-16: kun rdzob don dam nyid mi rigs //
T06TD4084E:219b-17: gang phyir dpyad pa bzod kyang ni //
T06TD4084E:219b-18: kun rdzob ces brjod mi rigs so //
T06TD4084E:219b-19: de ni dpyad pa'i nus pa las //
T06TD4084E:219b-20: gsal par dgag par mi nus pa'o //
T06TD4084E:219b-22: 'khrul par brjod kyis gzhan du min //
T06TD4084E:219b-23: bden dang bden min las grol ba'i //
T06TD4084E:219b-25: bden te 'gro ba sgyu ma nyid //
T06TD4084E:219b-26: phyi rol brdzun te nang ni bden //
T06TD4084E:219b-27: phyi rol don ni med pa ste //
T06TD4084E:219b-28: thams cad rang gi sems su mthong //
T06TD4084E:219b-29: de ltar sgyu ma rnam par bsgom //
T06TD4084E:219b-30: des ni stong pa rjes su dran //
T06TD4084E:219b-31: ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags pa'i //
T06TD4084E:219b-32: phyi yi don ni med pa ste //
T06TD4084E:219b-33: bag chags kyis ni bsgribs pa'i sems //
T06TD4084E:219b-34: don du snang ba rab tu 'byung //
T06TD4084E:219b-35: yid la mi byed rnal 'byor pas //
T06TD4084E:219b-36: chos kun rab tu mi gnas pa //
T06TD4084E:219b-37: thog ma nas zhi zag pa med //
T06TD4084E:219b-38: dbu ma zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T06TD4084E:219b-39: chos kun rab tu mi gnas pa //
T06TD4084E:219b-40: sgro btags kun spangs gnyis med shes //
T06TD4084E:219b-41: 'di yang spong bar gyur na ni //
T06TD4084E:219b-42: mo gsham bu yi bdag nyid de //
T06TD4084E:219b-43: kye ma las ngan me yis bsregs //
T06TD4084E:219b-44: mo gsham bu yang dbu mar 'dod //
T06TD4084E:219b-45: gang gi chos ni 'di lta bu //
T06TD4084E:219b-46: de yi chos min ji lta bu //
T06TD4084E:219b-47: nga yi dbu ma 'di yin mod //
T06TD4084E:219b-48: de la gnod pa ci zhig smos //
T06TD4084E:219b-49: rtog pa dang bral ma 'khrul pa'i //
T06TD4084E:219b-50: sems kyi gsal bas gnod pa yin //
T06TD4084E:219b-52: ma skyes pa yi gtan tshigs dang //
T06TD4084E:219b-53: gcig dang du mar bral bas kyang //
T06TD4084E:219b-54: 'di la gnod pa yod ma yin//
T06TD4084E:220a-0: @220a * // gsal ba tsam du yod pas so //
T06TD4084E:220a-1: sngon dang phyi ma de shes pa //
T06TD4084E:220a-2: gnyis med gang gis ma grub pa'o //
T06TD4084E:220a-3: so sor skyes pa de yi phyir //
T06TD4084E:220a-4: gtan tshigs de ni ma grub pa'o //
T06TD4084E:220a-5: skyes shing don gyi bya ba byed //
T06TD4084E:220a-6: de nyid don dam grub pas na //
T06TD4084E:220a-8: ma skyes gtan tshigs ma grub ste //
T06TD4084E:220a-9: brjod pa nyid kyis de ma grub //
T06TD4084E:220a-11: gsal ba'i tshul tsam gang du song //
T06TD4084E:220a-12: sems tsam nyid du rnam gzhag pa //
T06TD4084E:220a-13: ma skyes zhes ni ngas bshad de //
T06TD4084E:220a-14: chos kyi rje bos gsungs kyang ni //
T06TD4084E:220a-15: chad lta nyid kyi dri mas g-yogs //
T06TD4084E:220a-16: gcig dang du mas dngos po la //
T06TD4084E:220a-17: khyab pa la lar grub pa na //
T06TD4084E:220a-18: thams cad stong pa'i grub mtha' la //
T06TD4084E:220a-19: gtan tshigs 'dod pa'i bar chad byed //
T06TD4084E:220a-20: yang na 'jig rten grags pas sam //
T06TD4084E:220a-21: 'jig rten kun gyis brtags pa yi //
T06TD4084E:220a-22: dngos po rnams la yid mi brtan //
T06TD4084E:220a-23: 'on kyang tshad mas rigs pa yin //
T06TD4084E:220a-24: mngon sum rjes su dpag pa yis //
T06TD4084E:220a-25: gcig pu la lar ma mthong ste //
T06TD4084E:220a-26: de bsags pa ni du ma yin //
T06TD4084E:220a-27: khyab bya'i dngos kyang cung zad med //
T06TD4084E:220a-28: gcig dang du ma yod la khyab //
T06TD4084E:220a-30: ma 'khrul bar du snang tsam gyis //
T06TD4084E:220a-31: yod par smra ba rgyal ba yin //
T06TD4084E:220a-32: gsal zhing don gyi bya ba byed //
T06TD4084E:220a-33: rig gis rig pa rnams spangs nas //
T06TD4084E:220a-34: de ltar brdzun du smra ba ni //
T06TD4084E:220a-35: dmus long nyid kyis rab tu btags //
T06TD4084E:220a-36: gang zhig dpyad pa'i yi dags kyis //
T06TD4084E:220a-37: gsal ba'i dngos la gnod mi nus //
T06TD4084E:220a-38: de ni sems can so so la //
T06TD4084E:220a-39: rnam bcas gsal ba tsam du snang //
T06TD4084E:220a-40: ji ltar gsungs pa'i bsod nams tshogs //
T06TD4084E:220a-41: thams cad du ni srog yin te //
T06TD4084E:220a-42: de la rnam snang sdig pa'i bdag /'og tu kha bltas mnar med 'gro //
T06TD4084E:220a-43: gal te sku gzugs mchod rten dang //
T06TD4084E:220a-44: dam chos sbyin tshogs 'khrul yin na //
T06TD4084E:220a-45: bud med dang ni sha chang sogs //
T06TD4084E:220a-46: mkhan slob la sogs cis ma 'khrul //
T06TD4084E:220a-47: gal te de yang 'khrul zer na //
T06TD4084E:220a-48: slob dpon la sogs kha sogs la //
T06TD4084E:220a-49: mi gtsang ci ste dor mi bya //
T06TD4084E:220a-50: pha dang ma sogs rang gi sha //
T06TD4084E:220b-0: ci ste mi za rgyu ci @220b yod //
T06TD4084E:220b-1: khro chu khol ma cis mi 'thung //
T06TD4084E:220b-2: 'khrul kyang slob dpon ma gus sogs //
T06TD4084E:220b-4: 'khrul kyang sangs rgyas mchod sogs kyis //
T06TD4084E:220b-6: dge dang mi dge bas ci bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-7: rang nyid sangs rgyas yin zer na //
T06TD4084E:220b-8: yi dags kha nas me 'bar yin //
T06TD4084E:220b-9: de phyir grol lam ma grol bas //
T06TD4084E:220b-10: rgyal ba'i bstan pa nges byas te //
T06TD4084E:220b-11: dam pa'i las kun la gnas bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-12: dman pa'i las kun spang par bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-13: de phyir snying rje brtsam byas te //
T06TD4084E:220b-14: de nyid rig pas byams sems bskyed //
T06TD4084E:220b-16: bsod nams bskyed la brtson par bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs dang //
T06TD4084E:220b-18: mchod rten lha khang mchog dag bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-19: mchog tu yid 'ong bza' btung tshogs //
T06TD4084E:220b-20: lam stan la sogs dbul bar bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-21: pad ma'i dbus su bzhugs pa yi //
T06TD4084E:220b-22: gzugs bzang legs par bris pa dag / rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin gyis //
T06TD4084E:220b-24: dam chos dge slong dge 'dun rnams //
T06TD4084E:220b-25: srog kyang btang nas bsrung bar bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-26: gser dang rin chen dngul la sogs //
T06TD4084E:220b-27: mchog rten la ni rang gis 'bul //
T06TD4084E:220b-28: gser dang dngul gyi me tog dang //
T06TD4084E:220b-29: rdo rje byi ru mu tig sogs //
T06TD4084E:220b-30: dbang sngon dang ni mthon kha che //
T06TD4084E:220b-31: bee d'u rya sogs mchod rten mchod //
T06TD4084E:220b-32: dam chos smra ba rnams la ni //
T06TD4084E:220b-33: rdzas la sogs pas mchod par bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-34: de yi sems ni dga' bar bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-35: rtag par dam pa'i chos bsten te //
T06TD4084E:220b-36: bla ma gong ma'i ya rabs la //
T06TD4084E:220b-37: gus pas bsnyen bkur bya ba ste //
T06TD4084E:220b-38: byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-39: rdzas la sogs pas mchod par bya //
T06TD4084E:220b-40: sangs rgyas bzhin dus bcu la //
T06TD4084E:220b-41: gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mchod //
T06TD4084E:220b-42: dge slong rnams kyang mchod bya ste //
T06TD4084E:220b-43: sdom pa gsum la gnas phyir ro //
T06TD4084E:220b-44: mu stegs pa ni gzhan rnams la //
T06TD4084E:220b-45: gus pas phyag mchod mi bya ste //
T06TD4084E:220b-46: de rnams skyon dang bcas phyir ro //
T06TD4084E:220b-47: thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab dang //
T06TD4084E:220b-48: de las byung ba'i bstan pa bri //
T06TD4084E:220b-49: glegs bam sbyin par btang ba dang //
T06TD4084E:220b-50: snag tsha la sogs sbyin par bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-0: @221a * // 'bri mkhan dang ni yig dpon dang //
T06TD4084E:221a-2: zhing la sogs pa'ang nges par dbul //
T06TD4084E:221a-4: grong khyer pa yi ched du ni //
T06TD4084E:221a-5: 'dreg mkhan sman pa la zhing sbyin //
T06TD4084E:221a-6: skra la sogs pa bregs pa yis //
T06TD4084E:221a-7: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T06TD4084E:221a-8: sems can thams cad gnas sa ru //
T06TD4084E:221a-9: skyed mos tshal dag bya ba ste //
T06TD4084E:221a-10: rdzing bu khron pa 'bab chu ldan //
T06TD4084E:221a-11: shes rab can ni gnyer bar bsgo //
T06TD4084E:221a-12: bza' btung stan dang gos bcas bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-13: grong chud kun tu 'du khang bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-14: grong khyer kun du lha khang bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-15: chu med pa yi lam kun du //
T06TD4084E:221a-16: snod chus bkang ba kun du bzhag / nad pa sdug bsngal mgon med dang //
T06TD4084E:221a-17: phongs dang dman gzhan yongs su bsdu //
T06TD4084E:221a-18: rtag tu snying rje bya ba yin //
T06TD4084E:221a-20: dus tshigs las byung gsar thog gi / bza' dang btung ba'i bye brag dang //
T06TD4084E:221a-22: dang por bdag bza' rigs ma yin //
T06TD4084E:221a-23: dge slong ngam ni sdug phongs sam //
T06TD4084E:221a-24: dang por mchod bya rnams la sbyin //
T06TD4084E:221a-25: chu dag gnas pa'i sa ru ni //
T06TD4084E:221a-26: bcag lham gdugs dang dril chu dang //
T06TD4084E:221a-27: chu skyogs dang ni chu snod dang //
T06TD4084E:221a-28: khab dang skud pa la sogs gzhag /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum //
T06TD4084E:221a-29: rgun 'brum mar dang mig sman stsogs //
T06TD4084E:221a-30: chu gnas sa ru gzhag par bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-31: grub pa'i sngags dag bris ste gzhag //
T06TD4084E:221a-32: smin rnams dang ni bya ba'i rim //
T06TD4084E:221a-33: lus dang rkang pa mgo bo dag / skud pa'i mar khu'ang gzhag par bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-34: shing stan dang ni me long dang //
T06TD4084E:221a-35: bum pa khar gzhong sta ri stsogs //
T06TD4084E:221a-36: wa ti'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-37: chu med pa yi gnas kun du //
T06TD4084E:221a-38: sa yis skyor ba'i rdzing chu bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-39: brtags pa'i chu yis nang bkang bya //
T06TD4084E:221a-41: zan dang bu ram snum gyis bskor //
T06TD4084E:221a-42: grog ma'i tshang gi sgo rnams su //
T06TD4084E:221a-43: bu ram gyis bsgos bza' btung dag / yid ches mi la bskur nas ni //
T06TD4084E:221a-44: rtag par sbyin par bya ba yin //
T06TD4084E:221a-45: yi dags rnams la ci bde bar //
T06TD4084E:221b-0: zos pa'i @221b gting ngam gong du'ang rung //
T06TD4084E:221b-1: bza' btung sbyin par bya ba yin //
T06TD4084E:221b-2: khyi dang 'bu srin bya sogs la //
T06TD4084E:221b-3: ji ltar 'tsham par sbyin par bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-4: mu ge yi ni gnod pa dang //
T06TD4084E:221b-5: phas kyi rgol ba'i gnod pa dang //
T06TD4084E:221b-6: nad stsogs gnod pa byung gyur na //
T06TD4084E:221b-7: sems can rnams ni rjes bzung gi / so nam lo tog brlag gyur na //
T06TD4084E:221b-8: sa bon zan gyis rjes su gzung //
T06TD4084E:221b-9: dpya dag dbab par mi bya ste //
T06TD4084E:221b-10: yang na nyung zad dbab par bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-11: skyed 'gyed rnams la yongs su bskyab //
T06TD4084E:221b-12: sho gam spang ba'am mi dbab bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-13: sgo nas yongs su nyon mongs pa //
T06TD4084E:221b-14: 'di rnams las ni bsgral bar bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-15: rang gi yul ba'am gzhan yul gyi //
T06TD4084E:221b-16: chom rkun rnams ni nyer zhi bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-17: rdzas kyi rin thang nges par bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-18: rigs pas bya ba thams cad bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-19: mang du smra ba ci zhig dgos //
T06TD4084E:221b-20: shes rab stobs kyis bgros byas te //
T06TD4084E:221b-21: rang ngam gzhan la phan 'gyur bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-22: gang zag 'jig rten phan grub pa //
T06TD4084E:221b-23: de de thams cad brtag par bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-24: ci dang ci nas rang phan byed //
T06TD4084E:221b-25: de bzhin 'jig rten la phan bya //
T06TD4084E:221b-26: sa chu me rlung sman rnams dang //
T06TD4084E:221b-27: dgon pa yi ni shing bzhin du //
T06TD4084E:221b-28: bdag nyid yud tsam gcig pu yang //
T06TD4084E:221b-29: 'dod dgur spyad pa nyid du mdzod //
T06TD4084E:221b-30: gom pa bdun por bar du yang //
T06TD4084E:221b-31: bdog pa kun gtong sems 'chad pa'i //
T06TD4084E:221b-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni //
T06TD4084E:221b-33: bsod nams dpag med mkha' 'dra ste //
T06TD4084E:221b-34: bu mo gzugs mdzes legs brgyan pa //
T06TD4084E:221b-35: de don gnyer ba rnams byin na //
T06TD4084E:221b-36: de ni dam chos yongs 'dzin pa'i //
T06TD4084E:221b-37: gzugs ni so sor thob par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:221b-38: rgyan rnams kun dang ldan pa yi //
T06TD4084E:221b-39: bu mo stong phrag brgyad cu dag / yo byad kun dang lhan cig tu //
T06TD4084E:221b-40: thub pa yi ni sngon stsal to //
T06TD4084E:221b-41: gsal zhing rnam par bkra ba yi //
T06TD4084E:221b-42: gos dang rgyan rnams dag dang ni //
T06TD4084E:221b-43: dri dang phreng ba'i longs spyod stsogs //
T06TD4084E:221b-44: slong la rjes su brtse bas sbyin //
T06TD4084E:221b-45: gang phyir nor dang chos med pas //
T06TD4084E:221b-46: phongs shing sdug bsngal chen por 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:221b-47: de la de ma thag sbyin na //
T06TD4084E:221b-48: de las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa med //
T06TD4084E:221b-49: gang phyir dug gis phan gyur skabs //
T06TD4084E:221b-50: dug kyang sbyin par bya ba yin //
T06TD4084E:221b-51: gang phyir gnod par gyur na ni //
T06TD4084E:222a-0: zas mchog kyang ni sbyin mi @222a * //
T06TD4084E:222a-2: sbrul sos reg pa'i sor mo bcad //
T06TD4084E:222a-3: lam ni ji lta de lta bar //
T06TD4084E:222a-4: gzhan la phan na sdug bsngal kyang //
T06TD4084E:222a-5: thub pas bya bar gsungs pa yin //
T06TD4084E:222a-6: dam pa'i chos la gus par bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-7: chos smra ba la mchog tu bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-8: chos kyi nyan pa rtag tu bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-9: chos kyi sbyin pa rang gis bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-10: 'jig rten chos la chags mi bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-12: ji ltar bdag nyid de bzhin gzhan //
T06TD4084E:222a-13: yon tan kun ni bskyed par bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-14: dam chos thos pas mi ngoms bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-16: bla ma la yon phul nas ni //
T06TD4084E:222a-17: des ni rtag par bsten par bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-18: 'jig rten smin phyir thos pa btsal //
T06TD4084E:222a-19: rtsod pa'i don dang nga rgyal spang //
T06TD4084E:222a-20: rang gi yon tan brjod mi bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-21: dgra'i yang yon tan brjod par bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-22: gzhan gyi mtshang rnams 'bru mi bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-23: gdug pa'i sems ni bsdu mi bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-24: bdag nyid dam ni gzhan rnams kyi //
T06TD4084E:222a-25: 'khrul pa so sor brtag par bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-26: kha na ma tho gang zhig gis //
T06TD4084E:222a-27: gzhan gyi rgyud dag skyon can gyur //
T06TD4084E:222a-28: rang gi rgyud la mthong gyur na //
T06TD4084E:222a-29: mkhas pas de ma thag tu btang //
T06TD4084E:222a-30: gzhan la phan par dag gdags par bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-31: lan la lta bar mi bya'o //
T06TD4084E:222a-32: sdug bsngal bdag nyid gcig pus spyad //
T06TD4084E:222a-33: bde ba thun mong longs spyod bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-34: gal te phun sum tshogs gyur kyang //
T06TD4084E:222a-35: nga rgyal mtho sems mi bya zhing /
T06TD4084E:222a-36: phun sum tshogs med yi dags 'dra //
T06TD4084E:222a-37: longs spyod med kyang zhum mi bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-39: bden pa'i tshig tu smra bar bya //
T06TD4084E:222a-40: rang gi don du cang mi smra //
T06TD4084E:222a-41: don ni ji bzhin brjod gyur kyang //
T06TD4084E:222a-42: gzhan la gnod na bden ma yin //
T06TD4084E:222a-43: gzhan la gcig tu phan gyur na //
T06TD4084E:222a-44: don min brjod kyang bden pa yin //
T06TD4084E:222a-45: ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed //
T06TD4084E:222a-46: brtul zhugs brtan par gyur pa 'di //
T06TD4084E:222a-47: sa steng kun gyi dbang mchog tu //
T06TD4084E:222a-49: legs par brtags nas gang byed pa //
T06TD4084E:222a-50: thams cad kyis ni rtag par bstod //
T06TD4084E:222a-51: ji ltar gyur pa'i don bstan na //
T06TD4084E:222a-52: gzhan rnams yid ni ches par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222a-53: pha dang ma la mchod pa dang //
T06TD4084E:222a-54: skye bo ya rabs mchod pa dang //
T06TD4084E:222b-0: @222b 'tsho ba dag cing bzod pa dang //
T06TD4084E:222b-1: gtong phod tshig mi rtsub pa dang //
T06TD4084E:222b-2: dbyen dang brdzun dag mi smra ba //
T06TD4084E:222b-3: brtul zhugs 'di dag brten byas na //
T06TD4084E:222b-4: lha yi dbang por skye bar 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-5: der yang lha dbang byed par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-6: de phyir chos 'di spyad par bya //
T06TD4084E:222b-7: nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du //
T06TD4084E:222b-8: 'khar gzhong sum brgya'i bza' byin pa'i //
T06TD4084E:222b-9: bsod nams tshogs kyi phung po yis //
T06TD4084E:222b-10: yud tsam byams pa bsgoms pa yi //
T06TD4084E:222b-11: bsod nams tshogs la char mi phod //
T06TD4084E:222b-12: lha dang mi la sdug par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-13: 'di rnams kyis kyang srung bar byed //
T06TD4084E:222b-14: yid bde ba dang lus bde dang ;
T06TD4084E:222b-15: ; dug dang mtshon gyis gnod mi 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-16: tshegs med pa yis nor thob 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-17: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du yang skye //
T06TD4084E:222b-19: spyad cing gal te ma bral na'o //
T06TD4084E:222b-20: sems can rnams la sems bskyed bya //
T06TD4084E:222b-21: byang chub tu ni brtag par bya//
T06TD4084E:222b-22: ri rab lta bur brtan pa yi //
T06TD4084E:222b-23: byang chub sems ni thob par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-24: dad pas mi khom brgyad spangs te //
T06TD4084E:222b-26: stong pa nyid la goms byas pas //
T06TD4084E:222b-27: dge ba ma nyams thob par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-28: g-yo sgyu med pas dran pa 'thob //
T06TD4084E:222b-29: sems pa po yis blo gros thob //
T06TD4084E:222b-30: gus par byas pas don rtogs 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-31: dam chos bsrungs pas shes rab thob //
T06TD4084E:222b-32: chos kyi mnyan pas sbyin pa dang //
T06TD4084E:222b-33: sgrib pa med pa'i bya byas na //
T06TD4084E:222b-34: sangs rgyas nyid ni myur thob 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-35: ma chags pas ni don grub 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-36: ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel //
T06TD4084E:222b-37: nga rgyal med pas mchog tu 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-38: chos la bzod pas gzungs thob yin //
T06TD4084E:222b-39: snying po lnga ni rab sbyin na //
T06TD4084E:222b-41: stobs chen mchog tu gyur pa yi //
T06TD4084E:222b-42: bdung kun gyis ni mi brdzi ba'o //
T06TD4084E:222b-43: mchod rten la sogs rnams la ni //
T06TD4084E:222b-44: mar me yi ni phreng ba dbul //
T06TD4084E:222b-45: mun nag rnams su mar me spor //
T06TD4084E:222b-46: mar me'i ched du 'bru mar ster //
T06TD4084E:222b-47: lha yi mig dag thob par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:222b-48: mchod rten la sogs mchod pa'i phyir //
T06TD4084E:222b-49: sgra yi rnam grangs dril sogs dang //
T06TD4084E:222b-50: dung dang rnga sogs mchod pa'i phyir //
T06TD4084E:222b-51: sgra yi rnam grangs sgra 'bul na//
T06TD4084E:223a-0: @223a * // lha yi rna ba thob par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:223a-1: gzhan gyi skyon mthong mi sgrogs shing //
T06TD4084E:223a-2: 'khrul pa mthong yang lkugs pa bzhin //
T06TD4084E:223a-3: gzhan sems rjes su bsrungs pa yis //
T06TD4084E:223a-4: gzhan gyi sems shes thob par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:223a-5: bcag lham gru stsags bzhon pa ster //
T06TD4084E:223a-6: nyam ngar lhung las sgrol ba dang //
T06TD4084E:223a-7: bla ma rnams la sems pa yis //
T06TD4084E:223a-9: chos kyi 'bras bu rnams dran dang //
T06TD4084E:223a-10: de bzhin chos gzhung don dran pas //
T06TD4084E:223a-11: skye ba dran par 'gyur ba yin //
T06TD4084E:223a-12: dri med chos kyi sbyin ba dang //
T06TD4084E:223a-13: sna tshogs rnam dag smon lam gyis //
T06TD4084E:223a-14: sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam spyod byed //
T06TD4084E:223a-15: rin chen sbyin pas thub dbang gi /'od zer dpag med rab tu 'gyed //
T06TD4084E:223a-16: dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med par //
T06TD4084E:223a-17: yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes pas //
T06TD4084E:223a-18: mngon shes mchog tu gyur pa yi //
T06TD4084E:223a-19: drug pa zag pa kun zad pa'o //
T06TD4084E:223a-20: yon tan de rnams mdor bsdus te ;
T06TD4084E:223a-21: ; byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya //
T06TD4084E:223a-22: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T06TD4084E:223a-23: bsam gtan shes rab snying rje stsogs //
T06TD4084E:223a-24: rang rdzas gtong ba sbyin pa de //
T06TD4084E:223a-25: gzhan la phan byed tshul khrims so //
T06TD4084E:223a-26: bzod pas khro ba yongs gtong ba'o //
T06TD4084E:223a-28: bying rgod zhi ba bsam gtan te //
T06TD4084E:223a-29: yang dag don ston shes rab yin //
T06TD4084E:223a-30: sems can kun la ro gcig blo //
T06TD4084E:223a-31: snying rje zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T06TD4084E:223a-32: sbyin pas longs spyod thob par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:223a-33: tshul khrims kyis ni bde 'gro ste //
T06TD4084E:223a-34: bzod pa yis ni gzugs bzang ba'o //
T06TD4084E:223a-35: brtson 'grus kyis ni gzim dangs che //
T06TD4084E:223a-36: bsam gtan gyis ni shes rab grol //
T06TD4084E:223a-37: snying rjes don kun sgrub par byed //
T06TD4084E:223a-38: bdun po de rnams ma lus par //
T06TD4084E:223a-39: cig car pha rol phyin pa yi //
T06TD4084E:223a-40: bsam mi khyab pa'i ye shes yul //
T06TD4084E:223a-42: de ltar las dang 'bras bu dag / ma 'khrul tshul ni shes byas nas //
T06TD4084E:223a-43: rtag par 'gro la phan gdags bya //
T06TD4084E:223a-44: de nyid bdag la'ang phan par 'gyur //
T06TD4084E:223a-45: chos rnams nges pa zhes bya ba //
T06TD4084E:223a-46: byis pa'i skye bos rtogs bya'i phyir //
T06TD4084E:223a-47: gzhung rgyas gzhan las bdag gis ni //
T06TD4084E:223b-0: mdo ru bsdus te bris @223b pa yin //
T06TD4084E:223b-1: 'di brtsams dge ba gang thob des //
T06TD4084E:223b-2: mtha' yas sems can ma lus kun //
T06TD4084E:223b-3: rtag chad mtha' las grol gyur te //
T06TD4084E:223b-4: bla med byang chub thob par shog /
T06TD4084E:223b-5: pandi ta chen po ratna k'i rtis mdzad pa'i /
T06TD4084E:223b-6: chos rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa rdzogs so /
T06TD4084E:223b-9: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po ratna k'i rti dang /
T06TD4084E:223b-10: bod kyi lo ts'a ba chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
